name: Make Love Not War - VR
description:
This Game was made during Unreal Engine Winter Jam 2019
Make Love not War is Arcade VR game, you play with Bow and Arrow.
Want to feel like cupid, play this and experience some dramatic shows.

Story
Your country is a peace loving country , but your neighbors are hostile and are emotionally weak and have declared war on you guys. But who loves war? Right!! Certainly not you and your people. 
Also your people cant shoot a box at hand distance with a gun. So your army decides to make a love potion and target enemy army people's GF and BF and make them have affair with other people. This will emotionally disturb the enemy hence making them mentally not fit for war. 
Make as many couple as you can and stop this war!!
